byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: The Israeli news media said that three or four men were killed in the airstrike, and a spokeswoman for the Israeli military said that an armed squad had crossed into Israeli-controlled territory.

headline.print_headline: Israeli Military Says It Killed Armed Men in Strike on Golan Heights Frontier
headline.main: Israeli Military Says It Killed Armed Men in Strike on Golan Heights Frontier

snippet: The Israeli news media said that three or four men were killed in the airstrike, and a spokeswoman for the Israeli military said that an armed squad had crossed into Israeli-controlled territory.
abstract: Israeli military announces that it killed three or four men in airstrike on contested area along Israeli-Syrian border in Golan Heights; says men were intent on bombing Israeli forces.
